text:
Potentially stupid question, but I'm looking into incorporating some of the CMS APIs into our build system and stumbled across the "layouts" API methods here <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/layouts/get_layouts>

Anyone know what these line up with? My first thought was it was for templates, but templates have their own section.

I had always assumed that this was just another word for templates as well... Now I'm very curious.  I'm wondering if this is like the "layout" of a published page, i.e. a page created from a template with default content replaced
Layouts = Drag and Drop Templates. Templates = coded templates
